import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{v4}from'uuid';const initialState=[{id:v4(),title:'Task One',description:'Task One description',completed:false},{id:v4(),title:'Task Two',description:'Task Two description',completed:false}];export const taskSlice=createSlice({name:'task',initialState:initialState,reducers:{addTask:(state,action)=>{state.push(action.payload);},deleteTask:(state,action)=>{const taskFound=state.find(task=>task.id===action.payload);// console.log(taskFound)
if(taskFound){state.splice(state.indexOf(taskFound),1);}}}});export const{addTask,deleteTask}=taskSlice.actions;
